Package levels

Class LevelManager

java.lang.Object
levels.LevelManager
public class LevelManager extends Object
This class will handle things such as importing level sprites, drawing the level to the screen, and keep track of the current level played
Author:
johnbotonakis and Sean-Paul Brown

  • Constructor Details

    • LevelManager

      public LevelManager(Game game)
      Instantiates a manager for created level objects
      Parameters:
      game - - The Game object to which the level will be drawn onto

  • Method Details

    • loadLevels

      private void loadLevels()
      Load in the levels arrays with template levels.

    • importLevelSprites

      private void importLevelSprites()
      Imports the sprites to build a level

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g, int xLevelOffset)
      Draws the level to the screen with the provided sprite sheet
      Parameters:
      g - - the Graphics to draw on
      xLevelOffset - - the current xOffset of the game from screen-scrolling horizontally

    • setCurrentLevel

      public void setCurrentLevel(int levelIndex)
      Setter for the current level. The new current level will be the index of the levelIndex parameter.
      Parameters:
      levelIndex - - the index of the new current Level, it is mapped to the stage number

    • getCurrentLevel

      public Level getCurrentLevel()
      Returns the current level
      Returns:
      - The currently played level

    • getLevelAtIndex

      public Level getLevelAtIndex(int levelIndex)
      Getter for a specific index in the array of levels. They should be mapped to the stage number
      Parameters:
      levelIndex - - the specific index to get
      Returns:
      if can, the Level at the level index; if it is out of bounds, then return null

    • unhideNextLevels

      public void unhideNextLevels()
      Unhide levels based on the current Level.

    • unhideLevel

      private void unhideLevel(int index)
      Set the hidden boolean to false for the specific Level at the index in the parameters
      Parameters:
      index - - the index for the Level to set hidden falsez
